```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(vroom)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
# Download Byar & Greene prostate cancer data
url <- "https://github.com/Alex131313131313/DATA/raw/main/prostate.xlsx"
destination <- "../data/_raw/prostate.xlsx"

download.file(url, destination, method = "auto")
```

```{r}
# NOTE: You open prostate.xls and save it again to xlsx
prostate_data <- read_excel('../data/_raw/prostate.xlsx')
prostate_data <- write_delim(prostate_data, file= '../data/_raw/prostate.tsv', delim = "\t", col_names = TRUE)
```
